app.name: USB Loader GX
app.long_description:
USB Loader GX is a libwiigui based USB iso loader with a wii-like GUI. You can install games to your HDDs and boot them with shorter loading times. The interactive GUI is completely controllable with WiiMote, Classic Controller or GC Controller. Features are automatic widescreen detection, coverdownload, parental control, theme support and many more.
